notifications.body:
Vaadin Framework 8 is now declared as stable.

The version 8 is a first major release in years. Databinding APIs are completely revamped, several component settings have better defaults and we have dropped support for some legacy technologies.

Read the release blog and release notes for more details!
notifications.title: Vaadin Framework 8.0.0 released

notifications.body:
What's new in Vaadin Framework 8 and how do you get the most out of it? Join the project's lead developer Pekka Hyv√∂nen and Developer Advocate Matti Tahvonen in a discussion and presentation about Vaadin 8. Ask any questions beforehand or during the webinar and we'll answer them. Sign up to ensure your spot!

Webinar takes place on Tuesday March 7, 2017 @ 2PM CET
notifications.title: Webinar: What's new in Vaadin 8?

notifications.body: Vaadin Framework, Vaadin Framework Best Practices, and Vaadin Framework Client-side trainings are coming to New York, U.S. in May.
notifications.title: Vaadin Trainings in New York, U.S.

notifications.body:
Want to have a Vaadin presentation at your local event? We've received really good feedback and are happy to join you and your group as well – let's schedule it together!

Contact Vaadin Advocate Ville Ingman at ville@vaadin.com for more info.
notifications.title: Speech at your meetup or company?
